ShowTo(User, VisibleObject, Boolean)

Show a dialog sequence to a user.

Declaration
public void ShowTo(User invoker, VisibleObject target = null, bool runCheck = true)
Parameters
Type Name Description
User invoker

The user who will receive the dialog.
VisibleObject target

A target of the dialog; generally an associate (NPC/reactor tile)
System.Boolean runCheck

Whether or not to run any pre display checks before displaying the sequence
